name: exportreleasedef
description: Exports some or all release definitions in a project
author: Dan Stocker
helpMarkDown: The exports will be dropped in the current working directory (in a subfolder if specified)

inputs.name: UserName
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user name that should be used for the REST calls. Leave blank for personal access token.

inputs.name: Pass
inputs.label: Password or PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password or personal access token required to perform the REST calls.

inputs.name: FilterString
inputs.label: Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional 'contains' filter for release definition names

inputs.name: DropDir
inputs.label: Drop Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The subdirectory that the release definition(s) should be downloaded to. If this parameter is left empty, release definitions will land in the drop location directly.
